name: Cubetrix
description:
In Cubetrix© you'll have to rotate the piece according to the one that's coming in your direction, making them get the same rotation. So, use your reflection and spacial reasoning to get the higher score and compete globally, proving you're the best one. CAN YOU DO IT?

FEATURES:

* Addictive and challenging gameplay.

* Compete globally with worldwide.

* Develop your spatial reasoning.

* More than 120 different pieces.



Easy to learn, Hard to master.

BE THE BEST IN THE WORLD !!!
